trans-unit.source: Provides methods and properties for all activity designers that display parallel vertical layouts on a workflow design surface.

> [!NOTE] > [!INCLUDE[DeprecatedContent](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] An activity designer that displays a parallel vertical layout represents an activity on the workflow design surface that has two code paths that a workflow can follow.

For example, the designer used for the <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.IfElseActivity> activity displays the <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.IfElseActivity> activity on the workflow design surface and has a parallel vertical layout.
Each branch of the parallel layout visually represents an <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.IfElseBranchActivity> activity contained in the <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.IfElseActivity> activity.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ParallelActivityDesigner"></xref> class.
Returns a value that indicates whether child activities of the activity associated with the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ParallelActivityDesigner"></xref> can be moved.
The <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.HitTestInfo"></xref> that describes the location to move the activities to.
The <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity"></xref> read-only collection that contains the activities to move.
<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the activities can be moved from the parent activity; otherwise <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
Returns a value that indicates whether child activities of the activity associated with the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ParallelActivityDesigner"></xref> can be deleted.
The read-only collection of activities to remove.
<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the activities can be deleted from the parent activity; otherwise <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
Gets the first selectable object in the navigation order of the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ParallelActivityDesigner"></xref>.

If the designer's <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.CompositeActivityDesigner.Expanded%2A> property or the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner.IsVisible%2A> property is set to `false`, FirstSelectableObject returns a null reference (`Nothing` in Visual Basic).

If the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.CompositeActivityDesigner.ContainedDesigners%2A> property count is greater than 0, FirstSelectableObject returns the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity> associated with the first activity designer in the collection.
An <xref:System.Object> that is the first selectable object in the designer navigation order.
Returns array of rectangles that represent the valid drop locations within the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ParallelActivityDesigner"></xref>.
The <xref href="System.Drawing.Point"></xref> that defines the x- and y-coordinates for the drop target.
The <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"></xref> array that represents the valid drop locations within the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ParallelActivityDesigner"></xref>.
Returns the first selectable object that follows the specified object in the navigation order of the current <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ParallelActivityDesigner"></xref>.
The current <xref:System.Object> in the navigation order.
A <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerNavigationDirection"></xref> enumeration value that determines the navigation order of the designer.
An <xref:System.Object> that follows the specified object.
Gets the last selectable object in the navigation order of the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ParallelActivityDesigner"></xref>.

If the designer's <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.CompositeActivityDesigner.Expanded%2A> or <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner.IsVisible%2A> property is set to `false`, LastSelectableObject returns a null reference (`Nothing` in Visual Basic).

If <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ParallelActivityDesigner> contains child activity designers, LastSelectableObject returns the last selectable object associated with the first child activity designer.

If the child activity designer is collapsed, LastSelectableObject returns the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity> associated with the first activity designer in the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.CompositeActivityDesigner.ContainedDesigners%2A> collection.
The <xref:System.Object> that is the last selectable object in the designer navigation order.
Indicates that the user has created a new branch activity on the activity associated with the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ParallelActivityDesigner"></xref>.

The <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.CompositeActivity"></xref> that was added as the new branch of the activity associated with the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ParallelActivityDesigner"></xref>.
Performs layout tasks to position visual cues and child designers on the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ParallelActivityDesigner"></xref>.
The <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesignerLayoutEventArgs"></xref> that contains the layout arguments.
e contains a null reference ( in Visual Basic).
Sets the size of the visual cues on the designers contained within the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ParallelActivityDesigner"></xref>.
The <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesignerLayoutEventArgs"></xref> that contains the layout arguments.
The <xref href="System.Drawing.Size"></xref> that contains the new size settings for the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ParallelActivityDesigner"></xref>.
Draws the visual representation of the activity associated with the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ParallelActivityDesigner"></xref> at design time.
The <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesignerPaintEventArgs"></xref> that contains the drawing arguments.
Gets the collection of designer verbs to be associated with the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ParallelActivityDesigner"></xref>.
The Verbs property determines the commands that are displayed on the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ParallelActivityDesigner> context menu.
The verb collection includes any designer verbs <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ParallelActivityDesigner> inherits from the designer classes it extends.

An <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesignerVerbCollection"></xref> that contains the designer verbs to associate with the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ParallelActivityDesigner"></xref>.
